info.title: Databricks Iamv2 API (account)
info.description: OpenAPI specification for the Databricks iamv2 service (account-level APIs), generated from the Databricks Python SDK.

get.summary: Returns the access details for a principal in a workspace. Allows for checking access details for any
get.description:
Returns the access details for a principal in a workspace. Allows for checking access details for any
provisioned principal (user, service principal, or group) in a workspace. * Provisioned principal here
refers to one that has been synced into Databricks from the customer's IdP or added explicitly to
Databricks via SCIM/UI. Allows for passing in a "view" parameter to control what fields are returned
(BASIC by default or FULL).

:param workspace_id: int
  Required. The workspace ID for which the access details are being requested.
:param principal_id: int
  Required. The internal ID of the principal (user/sp/group) for which the access details are being
  requested.
:param view: :class:`WorkspaceAccessDetailView` (optional)
  Controls what fields are returned.

:returns: :class:`WorkspaceAccessDetail`

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: Required. The workspace ID for which the access details are being requested.

parameters.name: principal_id
parameters.description: Required. The internal ID of the principal (user/sp/group) for which the access details are being requested.

post.summary: Resolves a group with the given external ID from the customer's IdP. If the group does not exist, it
post.description:
Resolves a group with the given external ID from the customer's IdP. If the group does not exist, it
will be created in the account. If the customer is not onboarded onto Automatic Identity Management
(AIM), this will return an error.

:param external_id: str
  Required. The external ID of the group in the customer's IdP.

:returns: :class:`ResolveGroupResponse`

external_id.description: Required. The external ID of the group in the customer's IdP.

post.summary: Resolves an SP with the given external ID from the customer's IdP. If the SP does not exist, it will
post.description:
Resolves an SP with the given external ID from the customer's IdP. If the SP does not exist, it will
be created. If the customer is not onboarded onto Automatic Identity Management (AIM), this will
return an error.

:param external_id: str
  Required. The external ID of the service principal in the customer's IdP.

:returns: :class:`ResolveServicePrincipalResponse`

external_id.description: Required. The external ID of the service principal in the customer's IdP.

post.summary: Resolves a user with the given external ID from the customer's IdP. If the user does not exist, it
post.description:
Resolves a user with the given external ID from the customer's IdP. If the user does not exist, it
will be created. If the customer is not onboarded onto Automatic Identity Management (AIM), this will
return an error.

:param external_id: str
  Required. The external ID of the user in the customer's IdP.

:returns: :class:`ResolveUserResponse`

external_id.description: Required. The external ID of the user in the customer's IdP.

account_id.description: The parent account ID for group in Databricks.

external_id.description: ExternalId of the group in the customer's IdP.

internal_id.description: Internal group ID of the group in Databricks.

Group.description: The details of a Group resource.

account_id.description: The parent account ID for the service principal in Databricks.

account_sp_status.description: The activity status of a service principal in a Databricks account.

application_id.description: Application ID of the service principal.

display_name.description: Display name of the service principal.

external_id.description: ExternalId of the service principal in the customer's IdP.

internal_id.description: Internal service principal ID of the service principal in Databricks.

ServicePrincipal.description: The details of a ServicePrincipal resource.

account_id.description: The accountId parent of the user in Databricks.

account_user_status.description: The activity status of a user in a Databricks account.

external_id.description: ExternalId of the user in the customer's IdP.

internal_id.description: Internal userId of the user in Databricks.

User.description: The details of a User resource.

account_id.description: The account ID parent of the workspace where the principal has access.

permissions.description: The permissions granted to the principal in the workspace.

principal_id.description: The internal ID of the principal (user/sp/group) in Databricks.

status.description: The activity status of the principal in the workspace. Not applicable for groups at the moment.

workspace_id.description: The workspace ID where the principal has access.

WorkspaceAccessDetail.description: The details of a principal's access to a workspace.

State.description: The activity status of a user or service principal in a Databricks account or workspace.

WorkspaceAccessDetailAccessType.description: The type of access the principal has to the workspace.

WorkspaceAccessDetailView.description: Controls what fields are returned in the GetWorkspaceAccessDetail response.

WorkspacePermission.description: The type of permission a principal has to a workspace (admin/user).
